frontMatter.title: We introduced a memory database named scuba
frontMatter.summary: We introduced a memory database named scuba. In this paper, the author introduces a new memory storage layout to use column-oriented storage for better compression and faster query execution strategies. they reference lots of database design include Dremel Powerdrill etc.

prev.title: Distributed Systems in One Lesson by Tim Berglund
